rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with eco-friendly materials and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space with sustainable flooring and ample seating arrangements for joint family gatherings. Large windows facilitate ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area, promoting social interaction. Incorporates Vastu principles by positioning in the southeast corner.

rooms.name: Home Office / Study
rooms.description: Quiet space for work or study, with energy-efficient lighting and sound insulation to minimize disturbances.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom designed for guests with water-saving fixtures.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Eco-friendly design with storage and utility space, includes recycling bins as per green building standards.

openings.description: Large entrance designed for accessibility with natural lighting and ventilation.

openings.location: East facade of the living room
openings.description: Energy efficient and aesthetically pleasing, connecting indoor and outdoor spaces.
Small balcony providing natural ventilation and view, aligning with eco-friendly principles.
Strategically placed to enhance cross ventilation, following Vastu guidelines for energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private bedroom with large windows oriented according to Vastu principles for positive energy.

rooms.name: Secondary Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom for joint family members, ensuring privacy and natural lighting.

rooms.name: ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Water efficient design with eco-friendly fixtures, integrated into master bedroom.

rooms.name: Home Theater / Family Room
rooms.description: Multi-purpose entertainment room equipped with energy-saving AV system and soundproofing to suit a joint family setting.

openings.description: Provides access to a small outdoor space for relaxation.
Strategically placed to maximize natural light and ensure balanced Vastu energy distribution.
